. Critics might question why Joe Biden didn't immediately prepare to deploy as many as 150,000 troops to Afghanistan, Donald Rumsfeld writes. But "we would have needed many months to build a large occupying army," and this would have given the Taliban time to prepare for the conflict, and al Qaeda both the incentive and the opportunity to relocate.
